Event: WHO provide daily COVID situation updates
Novel coronavirus named as SARS-CoV-2. Disease named as COVID-19

Canada closes its borders to everywhere except the US
UK advises against non-essential travel/activities and to work from home if possible
Cases and deaths outside China exceed those in mainland China
